channel.title: How Do I Register An Offline Server? (There Is No Link)
channel.description: Dear Forums, I have entered my server and it worked but then it says my server isn't online and it says register here but there is no link! I really need help :confused: Thanks Arrowdude181

item.title: How Do I Register An Offline Server? (There Is No Link)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You need to have the server able to host players. Check the Tutorial Section for a guide on starting a server.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Register An Offline Server? (There Is No Link)

item.title: How Do I Register An Offline Server? (There Is No Link)
item.dc:creator: @arrowdude181 arrowdude181
item.description:
@arrowdude181 wrote:

Yes, If you go down to the bottom of that page it says ‘register a server’. Click on it and I have filled in all the details and clicked ok. It then says the server isn’t online and you must register here but there is no link.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Register An Offline Server? (There Is No Link)
